author: Ben Reed
description: Deliciously simple, fruity and ridiculously easy to drink. The quality and freshness of your pineapple juice is key to the success of this cocktail, which can also be made by muddling fresh pineapple.We'd also suggest you try our own Pineapple Martini Recipe.
name: Pineapple Martini (1990s recipe)
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
